snippet: Bringing a car into the United States that was not originally engineered to meet federal regulations can be a monumental task, but there are detours around some of the regulatory roadblocks.
abstract: Bringing a car into the United States that was not originally engineered to meet federal regulations can be a monumental task, but there are detours around some of the regulatory roadblocks.
